item.title: What are (Large) Language Models?
item.description: TL;DR A short summary on (Large) Language Models: What are the ideas and concepts behind Language Models? What are Language Models Large Language Models are rapidly transforming natural language processing tasks and have led to a huge hype around Artificial Intelligence and associated tasks. Especially with the introduction of GPT3.5(ChatGPT) in 2022 many people are interested in the capabilities of ML. But what is the foundation for the products that could impact our future world significantly?

item.title: A short summary on ChatGPT
item.description: This summary is based on another post: An introduction to ChatGPT written by ChatGPT While testing out ChatGPT for some weeks now, i found that texts created by it are often repetitive and monotonous. In this post i tried to condense the meaningful information from the other post. 2022 was the year of generative AI. Generative AI refers to machine learning algorithms that can create new meaning from text, images, code, and other forms of content.
